name: Porta
description:
PORTA is one of the two most important advertising agencies in Chile. Consistently, it has maintained its position in relation to the turnover, the importance of the customers it serves, the quality of its work and its prestige.
PORTA is led by a multidisciplinary group, which together with a group of 150 people and through different companies, operate in the areas of mass advertising, branding, design, digital production, industrial design, audiovisual production, promotional marketing and biometrics.
